definitions.text: a change from one state to the opposite state
examples: there was a reversal of autonomic function

definitions.text: an unfortunate happening that hinders or impedes; something that is thwarting or frustrating
turning in an opposite direction or position
examples: the reversal of the image in the lens

definitions.text: a decision to reverse an earlier decision
a judgment by a higher court that the judgment of a lower court was incorrect and should be set aside
the act of reversing the order or place of
a major change in attitude or principle or point of view
